article.title: Future prospects for exploring present day anomalies in flavour physics measurements with Belle II and LHCb

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the figure illustrate about the data taking periods of Belle II and LHCb?
choices: Both experiments will have continuous data-taking periods.
Both experiments will experience shutdowns during their data-taking periods.
Only Belle II will have shutdowns during its data-taking period.
Only LHCb will have shutdowns during its data-taking period.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the historical progression of inclusive and exclusive measurements of |Vub| and |Vcb| reveal?
choices: Inclusive and exclusive measurements of both parameters consistently agree.
A consistent discrepancy exists between inclusive and exclusive measurements.
Only inclusive measurements show a consistent increase in precision.
Only exclusive measurements show a consistent increase in precision.

multiple_choice_question.text: What trend does the figure show concerning the compatibility between inclusive and exclusive measurements of |Vub| and |Vcb|?
choices: The compatibility improves over time.
The compatibility worsens over time.
The compatibility remains stable over time.
The figure does not provide information on compatibility.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which measurement of |Vub| or |Vcb| demonstrates the most significant improvement in sensitivity at the first milestone with Belle II?
choices: |Vub| inclusive
|Vub| exclusive
|Vcb| inclusive
|Vcb| exclusive

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the effective Hamiltonian (Heff) describe in the context of this article?
choices: Weak decays of charm quarks
Flavor-changing neutral current decays of bottom quarks
Production of bottom quarks at the LHC
Lepton flavor violating decays of tau leptons
